NAME: CA Irasha Agrawal
ABOUT: Experience in the working in accounting industry. Having experience in department of Auditing, Taxation and Finance during the training period from R.K. Singhania and Associate. Skilled knowledge in Microsoft Excel, Management, Microsoft Word, Project Finance, Tally ERP, Taxation and Auditing. Strong information technology professional with a Bachelor's degree focused in Business/Commerce, General from Maharaja Agrasen Internation College Samata Colony. Chartered accountant from the ICAI.
